attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This country is in a crisis  of confidence.  Peoples finances are in meltdown, the country's financial situation is in meltdown.  Where are you Gordon Brown?  We are told you are the man with the experience to guide us through the hard times.  Yet we never see you or hear from you other than when you impose a new law or another tax.  Now is the time Gordon, to get stuck in, or get thrown out!

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
